Judul: DEVELOPMENT OF IOS-BASED LEARNING MANAGEMENT  SYSTEM EDUNEX MOBILE APPLICATIONS
Abstrak:
People's habits in using social media communication technology such as, WhatsApp,
Instagram, Facebook, and others can be used as guidelines for designing online
learning. One of the innovations in the learning system by utilizing technology
communication that is Edunex. Edunex is a Learning Management System that
developed by the Directorate of Education Development of ITB and can be accessed
through the website www.edunex.itb.ac.id. However, according to Bernacki,
accessibility on the website platform is lower than on the mobile platform. This
causes the features provided by the Edunex are not accessed and used maximally.
Therefore we need the Edunex mobile application to improve accessibility on Edunex.

The Edunex mobile app is built with a native paradigm because paradigm native
provides better user convenience compared to hybrids. Applications that are the result
of research assignments is an iOS-based mobile application that is built using a
framework SwiftUI and UIKit work. Students will be provided with features such as
messages, exams, attendance, CRS, notifications, and viewing materials.Data
displayed and processed on each feature of the Edunex mobile application will be the
same as that on the site because it is integrated with the Edunex site server.

After performing performance testing on the Edunex mobile application based on iOS
by utilizing Sentry tools, the application is considered successful by achieving pretty
good satisfaction. So that the application is considered capable of providing good user

comfort by providing excellent performance satisfying. The performance tested on the
application is the total crashes in the application, Apdex, failure percentage, and others.
Kontributor / Dosen Pembimbing: Prof. Yusep Rosmansyah, S.T., M.Sc., Ph.D.
Kata Kunci: learning management system, Edunex, native paradigm, iOS
